thread.title: BRIEF-Semtech - Alibaba Cloud And Zhejiang Provincial Company Of China Unicom Jointly Deployed Pre Commercial Service For IOT

title: BRIEF-Semtech - Alibaba Cloud And Zhejiang Provincial Company Of China Unicom Jointly Deployed Pre Commercial Service For IOT

organizations.name: alibaba cloud and zhejiang provincial company of china unicom
al company of china unicom jointly deployed pre commercial service

text:
April 9, 2018 / 1:40 PM / Updated 17 minutes ago BRIEF-Semtech - Alibaba Cloud And Zhejiang Provincial Company Of China Unicom Jointly Deployed Pre Commercial Service For IOT Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 9 (Reuters) - Semtech Corp: 
* ALIBABA CLOUD AND ZHEJIANG PROVINCIAL COMPANY OF CHINA UNICOM JOINTLY DEPLOYED PRE COMMERCIAL SERVICE FOR IOT BASED ON LORA TECHNOLOGY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
